recommendations.title: Understanding Credit Utilization and Your Score
recommendations.description: Learn how credit utilization affects your credit score and why keeping it below 30% is important. Includes strategies for paying down balances strategically.
recommendations.rationale: Your credit card ending in 3197 is at 47% utilization ($11,644 of $25,000). Reducing below 30% could improve your credit score and may reduce interest charges of approximately $225/month.
recommendations.disclaimer: This is educational content, not financial advice. Consult a licensed advisor for personalized guidance.

recommendations.title: Setting Up Autopay to Avoid Late Fees and Interest
recommendations.description: Step-by-step guide to setting up automatic minimum payments or full-balance autopay. Includes tips for avoiding overdrafts and managing payment dates.
recommendations.rationale: Automating your credit card payments can help you avoid late fees and build consistent payment history. With 1 cards to manage, automation reduces mental overhead.
recommendations.disclaimer: This is educational content, not financial advice. Consult a licensed advisor for personalized guidance.

recommendations.title: How Interest Charges Work: APR, Compounding, and Grace Periods
recommendations.description: Demystify credit card interest calculations. Learn about daily periodic rates, grace periods, and how carrying a balance costs more than you think.
recommendations.rationale: You're currently paying approximately $225/month per month in interest charges. Understanding how interest compounds can motivate faster paydown strategies.
recommendations.disclaimer: This is educational content, not financial advice. Consult a licensed advisor for personalized guidance.
